message:
Hi guys, as we all know, PayPal repeatedly announced that it supports Egypt now in both Sending and receiving money. we can see that from their  Offerings website http://goo.gl/iLWxuD.

However, i get "PayPal accounts opened in this country or region currently cannot withdraw funds. We regret any inconvenience this may cause you." Any one successfully received anything from his PayPal and how ??
story: Ahmed Ezz shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Send and Receive International Payments - PayPal Worldwide
caption: paypal.com
description: Use PayPal to send and receive money worldwide. With over 230 million accounts worldwide and growing, we help you securely, easily and quickly pay and get paid locally and across borders. Select a country or region to find out about PayPal’s offerings:

data.message:
Funds Withdrawal Not Available For Your Account
Secure Transaction 
PayPal accounts opened in this country or region currently cannot withdraw funds. We regret any inconvenience this may cause you.
We are continually expanding our global network to give valued users like you greater access to the wide range of PayPal options. :) :)

انا ببعت لهم من اول شهر اكتوبر اللى كان مفروض خاصية الاستقبال تتفعل فيه، الاول اتقالي جاري العمل على تحديث الموقع، بعد كده بدأ الـRollout للخدمة و انتظر و قريب هتجيلك، فى الاخر صدمونى و قالولي ببساطة تم تأجيل تفعيل الخدمة فى مصر لاجل غير محدد. لازم كلنا نعمل حمله و نراسلهم، قرروا و انا معاكم لان كده استهبال.
استهبال فعلاً خصوصاً إن البنك العربي الأفريقي وموقع والتي حواراتهم طويلة ومصاريف كتيرة جداً عشان تعمل online payment عندهم

This is what I got 2 weeks ago when I asked them about this issue:

Dear Mahmoud Mohammed Abd El-Fattah,

Thank you for contacting PayPal regarding the status of the new options to the Egyptian account.
I would like to inform you that PayPal is updating its services and all of our Egyptian customers would be able to receive and withdraw money to their Visa card or US bank account  from their PayPal accounts but the launch has been postponed, once this feature will be activate you will be notify by e-mail.

Please note that it might take some time for the service to be active for all of our customers in Egypt. I assure you that you will be able to benefit from that service as soon as possible.
 
We appreciate your patience and understanding regarding this matter, and wish you continued success on PayPal.
بالظبط، اتأجل، و مهما حاولت تعرف منهم تاريخ محدد مش هيدوك! حاجه قرف
Actually I'll assume its our bank system problems, howa bardo Fe 7aga hatemshy henna Fe m3adha
Exactly whats the point of signing to paypal if you can not receive money with it. i tried adding an US bank account but they didnt add it coz am in Egypt
Indeed!! So any online payment gateway actually works with Egypt ??

Skrill(Previously MoneyBookers) works well, they are British as far as I know and altough it's working fairly well, you'll find a good amount of criticism for them.
Getting your account verified in the beginning is annoying but after that things should go smoothly.
I've been using it for more than 5 years on and off.
Nice Thanks Diaa Sami i'll try that
by the way, is it public accessible for any users can pay with their credit cards direct or they should have account (like paypal) ??

actually while i'm searching today, i found this
https://www.paytabs.co/
